comments:
I also noticed several problems with enabling/disabling "verbose" mode. 
(Example: sleeping jobs didn't show up after enabling "Verbose". I had to 
close and reopen the view).

I just reproduced this on the RC3 candidate I2004061804
This was pretty major as once I started getting the error dialogs reporting the 
error (and there was lots of them) I had to shutdown and restart Eclipse to 
regain control.

Created an attachment (id=12627)
patch for NewProgressViewer.java

I assume you mean a dispose check in NewProgressViewer.getSelection() ?
